DataElement.preferredName: Subject Continue Clinical Study Screening Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no response regarding whether an individual will continue with processes to consider them as potential subjects for enrollment in a research conducted on human subjects.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Subject Continue Clinical Study Trial Screening
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed._Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption._Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research._A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed.

Concepts.definition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed.

Property.preferredDefinition: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.:Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.

Concepts.definition: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.

Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Will study participant contin
ReferenceDocuments.description: Will study participant continue with remaining study screening procedures?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Will subject continue to participate fully in the study

ReferenceDocuments.description: Based on pathology review, is the patient eligible to continue on to molecular screening?
